mapper.select: SELECT W.ART_NO, W.ART_NAME, W.PATH, W.PRICE, W.THEME, W.STATE, R.AUTHOR_NO, R.AUTHOR_NAME, R.AUTHOR_INTRO FROM AUTHOR R, ARTWORK W WHERE R.AUTHOR_NO(+) = W.AUTHOR_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUTHOR R, ARTWORK W WHERE R.AUTHOR_NO(+) = W.AUTHOR_NO AND W.STATE = 1 AND W.THEME = #{theme} AND (W.ART_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR R.AUTHOR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')

SELECT B.ART_NO, B.AUTHOR_NO, B.AUTHOR_NAME, B.AUTHOR_INTRO, B.ART_NAME, B.PATH, B.PRICE, B.THEME, B.STATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.ART_NO, A.AUTHOR_NO, A.AUTHOR_NAME, A.AUTHOR_INTRO, A.ART_NAME, A.PATH, A.PRICE, A.THEME, A.STATE FROM (SELECT ART_NO, R.AUTHOR_NO, R.AUTHOR_NAME, R.AUTHOR_INTRO, ART_NAME, PATH, PRICE, THEME, STATE FROM AUTHOR R, ARTWORK W WHERE R.AUTHOR_NO(+) = W.AUTHOR_NO AND W.THEME = #{theme} AND W.STATE = 1 AND (W.ART_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR R.AUTHOR_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%') ORDER BY W.ART_NO DESC ORDER BY W.PRICE DESC ORDER BY W.PRICE ASC ) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT W.ART_NO, W.ART_NAME, W.PATH, W.PRICE, W.THEME, W.STATE, U.AUTHOR_NO, U.AUTHOR_NAME, U.AUTHOR_INTRO FROM AUTHOR U, ARTWORK W WHERE U.AUTHOR_NO(+) = W.AUTHOR_NO AND ART_NO = #{artNo}
SELECT DISTINCT AUTHOR_NAME FROM AUTHOR WHERE AUTHOR_NAME LIKE #{query} || '%'
SELECT DISTINCT ART_NAME FROM ARTWORK WHERE ART_NAME LIKE #{query} || '%'
